name: multiscale

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.

short_effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
